page.title: 16POST OFFICES AND SHOPS
page.content:
The 150 year old Moulton Post Office and General Stores which sells a wide range of household goods,once contained a butchers and slaughter- house. It also had a paddock where animals would be kept until they were slaughtered for their meat. The present owners, Mr. and Mrs. Marcell have worked their for 4 years and live around the shop. The assistant has worked there for 35 years.
The present owners of Moulton Avenue Shop + Post Office in Kentford, have been working there for 4 months. They have no staff, just looking after the business by themselves and living in a small bungalow at the rear of the shop. They sell a wide range of things like sweets, wines, general home stores and also milk, rolls, scones and meat.
